text.name: sys_description
text.text: Ports of games to make them run natively on this machine. Most commonly are done with amateur/homebrew titles that are commonly alternate versions, parodies, or love-letters to well-known franchises, but can also be completely original in concept. They generally use assets created by hand (one exception being the original Zelda games from Solarus and Streets of Rage from OpenBOR) such as Cave Story or Gudule, which were created completely from scratch.
